mapper.insert: insert into users (user_type, email, username, password, created_at) values (1, #{email}, #{username}, #{password}, now());
insert into guestbook_configs (user_id, activation, private_read, member_write, guest_write) values (#{userId}, 1, 0, 1, 1);
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_type, u.email, u.username, pi.saved_file_name, pi.extension, pi.directory from users as u left join profile_images as pi on u.id = pi.user_id where u.email = #{email} and u.password = #{password};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_images(saved_file_name, user_id, original_file_name, extension, directory) VALUES (#{saved_file_name}, #{userId}, #{original_file_name}, #{extension}, #{directory})
